title: Remarkable moment basketball loving brothers use leaf blower to 'magically' levitate ball in mid-air
text:
Two basketball-loving brothers have filmed remarkable footage of themselves levitating a ball using just a leaf blower.

Jarrod and Ryan Larsen were experimenting with the powerful device outside their home in Benton, Arkansas earlier this year.

They tried levitating numerous objects, until they discovered that a basketball worked best and were able to keep it in the air for minutes at a time.

Jarrod and Ryan Larsen were experimenting with the powerful device outside their home in Benton, Arkansas earlier this year (left). They tried levitating numerous objects, until they discovered that a basketball worked best and were able to keep it in the air for minutes at a time (right)

The result, like something out of Harry Potter, shows the ball rotating at speed in mid-air as the brothers manoeuvre it around their garden.

Jarrod said: 'I was very satisfied and pleased with the outcome, it was better than we expected.

'It's really awesome that so many people have seen me and my family having fun. I'd like to see what else the leaf blower can do!'

The pair become so adept at using the leaf blower to control the ball that they're even able to score a slam dunk.

And later in the footage, one of the brothers is able to keep the ball floating over the others head before letting it suddenly drop and bounce away.
